title: See What's New with Sales Cloud Unit | Salesforce Trailhead

questions.title: 1With Lightning for Gmail, when can you relate an email to a Salesforce record?

answers.content: C As you compose your email within Gmail, you can relate it directly to a Salesforce record.

wrongAnswers.content: B Once you've sent the email, you can open the Salesforce record and click Attach Email.
D In order to relate a Gmail message to a Salesforce record, you must use a Lightning email template.
A Once you've sent the email, you can drag it onto the Salesforce record.

correctAnswer.content: C As you compose your email within Gmail, you can relate it directly to a Salesforce record.

questions.title: 2Which of the following is true about Einstein suggestions in Sales Cloud?

answers.content: D Suggestions for new contacts appear on account records.

wrongAnswers.content: B Suggestions for new contacts and opportunity roles appear in the Einstein component on contact records.
A When a rep declines suggested data, it disappears from their list, but others can still see the suggestion.
C Suggestions for new opportunity roles are visible only to the opportunity owner.

correctAnswer.content: D Suggestions for new contacts appear on account records.
